Medium: Folded lithograph, offset printed from a portfolio of nineteen printed objects (including box cover)
Dimensions: composition: 65 7/8 x 12" (167.4 x 30.5 cm); sheet (folded): 4 3/16 x 12" (10.7 x 30.5 cm); sheet (unfolded): 70 15/16 x 12" (180.2 x 30.5 cm)
Title: Continuous Project Altered Daily from Artists & Photographs
